title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6208.1 - Application for order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6208.1 - Application for order

State Regulations

An application to the State Board of Elections for an order, pursuant to provisions of section 128 of chapter 111 of the Laws of 1982 and
section 3 of chapter 112 of the Laws of 1982, shall be by a petition of a
citizen or candidate aggrieved thereby, duly verified, which shall
contain: (a) the name and full
residence address of the petitioner; (b) a concise specification of the
description of the district or districts to be corrected and a statement of
each section of the act in which such description appears or should be included
if omitted; and
(c) a complete
statement of the reason or reasons for such request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6208.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
